SELECT free_seq, free_title, free_content,free_nickname, free_writer, free_regdate, free_updatedate,free_readCnt,free_replyCnt FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY free_seq DESC) rn, free_seq, free_title, free_content, free_writer, free_nickname, free_regdate, free_updatedate,free_readCnt,free_replyCnt FROM tbl_freeboard
) WHERE rn BETWEEN (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount} + 1 AND #{pageNum} * #{amount}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_freeboard (free_seq, free_title, free_content, free_writer, free_nickname) VALUES (free_seq.nextval, #{free_title}, #{free_content}, #{free_writer}, #{free_nickname})
